:::Godfather/Sharpedge:::

Godfather: Alirght!
::He activates his jetpack and flies up to Astroblast::
Godfather: Yo, me an' my buddy over there want to join your family(mob talk 
for asking to join the Decepticons).
~~~~~
::Sharpedge smiles widely::
Sharpedge: Yessss. Ive been hungry for destruction! I haven't killed anyone 
since Testifier!
::He follows everyone else::

--part1_7e.150c20ba.2835d27b_boundary
